Package org.epzilla.leader.message

Interface Summary
MessageMeta This interface defines the message IDs which are sent in RMI messages.
 

Class Summary
EventHandler This is epZilla Event Driven Architecture logic.
MessageDecoder This is the RMI message decoder class which is used to receive RMI messages and decode the message and identify the meaning of the message and then fire the relevant epzilla event to handle the logic.
MessageGenerator This is the class used to generate messages to send using RMI to other nodes.
RejectReason This class is used to define the reasons for the message 6-NOT ACCEPTED HERE.
RmiMessageClient This class is used to send RMI messages to other nodes and dispatchers.
RmiMessageHandler This is the RMI message handler where all the received RMI messages are queued here and our observer will enqueue the messages and start decoding the messages.
